# Data Grid

This is an experimental 3rd-party component, brought in to test the feasibility of using vendor components. Use at your own risk.

```html:preview
<data-grid
  data-url="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/lekoala/data-grid/demo.json"
  data-resizable="true"
  data-sort="true"
  selectable="true"
  expand="true"
  responsive
></data-grid>
```

```pug:slim
data-grid[
  data-url="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/lekoala/data-grid/demo.json"
  data-resizable="true"
  data-sort="true"
  selectable="true"
  expand="true"
  responsive
]
```
